TopicTitle: SSTO To Gilly (no mining or refueling)

Articles.Content: While in the grand scheme of things this isn't really THAT impressive but im currently editing a video where I go to Gilly and back in a modified version of the Javelin SSTO (also utilizing ion engines, and actually getting them to work properly) should be up later tonight

just to annoy everyone: the editing process mucked up the video but now that im looking at other gilly ssto videos i think i was actually very efficient and i might just link the craft file in the video cause... idk a kerbal is proud, you feel me?

Video is up now

Not as impressive but still an interesting mission and I was surprised how well the ion engines worked out in the end
